Text:
Since I forgot to let the torrent's data files have their own folder, you might wish to create one manually and copy the files in after you finished the download.

This document describes how to do this without making ÂľTorrent complain:

http://www.utorrent.com/documentation/migrate

See "Moving files to another location after they have been loaded in ÂľTorrent" at the bottom.
Can you please share the English subtitles for the movies?

Sorry, I don't have subs for this stuff.
